blogPost.excerpt:
Tom Clancy's Without Remorse, or simply Without Remorse, is an upcoming American action thriller film directed by Stefano Sollima and written by Taylor Sheridan and Will Staples. It is based on the 1993 novel of the same name by Tom Clancy and a spin-off of the Jack Ryan film series.

The film tells the origin story of John Kelly (aka John Clark), a U.S. Navy SEAL, who uncovers an international conspiracy while seeking justice for the murder of his pregnant wife by Russian soldiers. When Kelly joins forces with fellow SEAL Karen Greer and shadowy CIA agent Robert Ritter, the mission unwittingly exposes a covert plot that threatens to engulf the U.S. and Russia in an all-out war.

FB: www.facebook.com/WithoutRemorseMovie
TW: www.twitter.com/WithoutRemorse
IG: www.instagram.com/WithoutRemorseMovie

About Prime Video:
Want to watch it now? We've got it. This week's newest movies, last night's TV shows, classic favorites, and more are available to stream instantly, plus all your videos are stored in Your Video Library. blogPost.body:
Tom Clancy's Without Remorse, or simply Without Remorse, is an upcoming American action thriller film directed by Stefano Sollima and written by Taylor Sheridan and Will Staples. It is based on the 1993 novel of the same name by Tom Clancy and a spin-off of the Jack Ryan film series.

The film tells the origin story of John Kelly (aka John Clark), a U.S. Navy SEAL, who uncovers an international conspiracy while seeking justice for the murder of his pregnant wife by Russian soldiers. When Kelly joins forces with fellow SEAL Karen Greer and shadowy CIA agent Robert Ritter, the mission unwittingly exposes a covert plot that threatens to engulf the U.S. and Russia in an all-out war.

localize.title: 无怨无悔 - 官方预告片 | Prime Video
localize.description:
汤姆-克兰西的《无悔》，简称《无悔》，是一部即将上映的美国动作惊悚片，由斯蒂法诺-索利马执导，泰勒-谢里丹和威尔-斯塔普斯编剧。该片根据1993年汤姆-克兰西的同名小说改编，是杰克-瑞恩系列电影的衍生作品。

影片讲述了美国海豹突击队队员约翰-凯利(又名约翰-克拉克)在为自己怀孕的妻子被俄罗斯士兵谋杀而寻求正义的过程中发现了一个国际阴谋的起源故事。当凯利与同为海豹突击队队员的凯伦-格里尔（Karen Greer）和暗中的中情局特工罗伯特-里特（Robert Ritter）联手时，这次任务无意中暴露了一个隐秘的阴谋，这个阴谋有可能使美国和俄罗斯卷入一场全面的战争。

FB：www.facebook.com/WithoutRemorseMovie
TW：www.twitter.com/WithoutRemorse
IG：www.instagram.com/WithoutRemorseMovie

关于Prime Video。

想现在看吗？我们已经准备好了。本周最新的电影、昨晚的电视节目、经典的最爱等，都可以即时串流，而且您的所有视频都存储在您的视频库中。超过 150,000 部电影和电视剧，其中包括数千部供 Amazon Prime 会员免费观看的影片。

localize.title: 無怨無悔 - 官方預告片 | Prime Video
localize.description:
湯姆-克蘭西的《無悔》，簡稱《無悔》，是一部即將上映的美國動作驚悚片，由斯蒂法諾-索利馬執導，泰勒-謝里丹和威爾-斯塔普斯編劇。該片根據1993年湯姆-克蘭西的同名小說改編，是傑克-瑞恩系列電影的衍生作品。

影片講述了美國海豹突擊隊隊員約翰-凱利(又名約翰-克拉克)在爲自己懷孕的妻子被俄羅斯士兵謀殺而尋求正義的過程中發現了一個國際陰謀的起源故事。當凱利與同爲海豹突擊隊隊員的凱倫-格里爾（Karen Greer）和暗中的中情局特工羅伯特-裏特（Robert Ritter）聯手時，這次任務無意中暴露了一個隱祕的陰謀，這個陰謀有可能使美國和俄羅斯捲入一場全面的戰爭。

FB：www.facebook.com/WithoutRemorseMovie
TW：www.twitter.com/WithoutRemorse
IG：www.instagram.com/WithoutRemorseMovie

關於Prime Video。

想現在看嗎？我們已經準備好了。本週最新的電影、昨晚的電視節目、經典的最愛等，都可以即時串流，而且您的所有視頻都存儲在您的視頻庫中。超過 150,000 部電影和電視劇，其中包括數千部供 Amazon Prime 會員免費觀看的影片。

previous.excerpt:
The Proud Boys gathered at the Washington Monument at 10 a.m. on Jan. 6 dressed “incognito” to avoid detection, and then fanned out across the Capitol to prevent law enforcement from identifying them en masse, prosecutors alleged Monday in a legal filing that provides the most detail yet about the group’s actions on the day of the insurrection.

Read more here: https://www.politico.com/news/2021/03/01/proud-boys-capitol-472012

-----------------------------------------   

Subscribe to our channel! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgjtvMmHXbutALaw9XzRkAg?view_as=subscriber

Check out our video catalog: https://www.politico.com/video      

Follow POLITICO here:   
➤ Twitter: https://twitter.com/politico/ 
➤ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/politico/   
➤ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/politico/

#ProudBoys #Terrorism
previous.title: Graham asks FBI director if the 'Proud Boys' are  a domestic terrorist group

localize.title: 格雷厄姆向FBI局长询问 "骄傲男孩 "是否是国内恐怖组织。
localize.description:
检察官周一在一份法律文件中称，"骄傲男孩 "于1月6日上午10点聚集在华盛顿纪念碑，穿着 "隐姓埋名 "以避免被发现，然后分散到国会大厦，以防止执法人员集体识别他们，该文件提供了迄今为止关于该组织在叛乱当天行动的最详细的信息。

点击这里阅读更多信息：https://www.politico.com/news/2021/03/01/proud-boys-capitol-472012

-----------------------------------------   

订阅我们的频道！https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgjtvMmHXbutALaw9XzRkAg?view_as=subscriber

查看我们的视频目录：https://www.politico.com/video

#骄傲的男孩# 恐怖主义

localize.title: 格雷厄姆向FBI局長詢問 "驕傲男孩 "是否是國內恐怖組織。
localize.description:
檢察官週一在一份法律文件中稱，"驕傲男孩 "於1月6日上午10點聚集在華盛頓紀念碑，穿着 "隱姓埋名 "以避免被發現，然後分散到國會大廈，以防止執法人員集體識別他們，該文件提供了迄今爲止關於該組織在叛亂當天行動的最詳細的信息。

點擊這裏閱讀更多信息：https://www.politico.com/news/2021/03/01/proud-boys-capitol-472012

-----------------------------------------
